text: Grandma's will payout. You know what that means right?
Some poor sod dropped his wallet and is nowhere to be found. Oh well!
Monthly food expenses. Sheesh, thats a lot!
Your friend really wants you to buy stocks in their company
You could actually use a new car, to be honest
Lets buy ourselves a brand new suit, shall we?
Hospital fees. You could use some excercise!
Saving money for a rainy day
